title: BUG WITH LOW PRIORITY QUEUE
body:
I had one game low priority queue and when i waited 5 minutes it REFRESHED...AND REFRESHED...AND NEVER STOPPED....HOW DO YOU STOP THIS RIOT?
THanks

replies.body: Uninstall and pray to god it works once again you install it{{champion:32}}

Riot please fix this bug, its been going on for 3 days now. Please do something about this and plz change the rule of afk or dc, bcoz its ridiculous that after just leaving 1 game coz i was lagging bad, that u put me in low prior queue
